title: What is the Sinedrio and the Fundamental Law of the GR ●●● OR ●●● EG ●●● in occult philosophy?
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author explained the occult constitution of the spiritual and mystic philosophical temple. The text consisted of the explanation of the term Sinedrio, its sole name representing the communion of the perfect, and the degrees and manifestation of the spiritual state of each adept. The author goes on to describe the Sinedrio in its unique scientific form as Ammonia or Solare, and in its transitory form as Giuliano or Solar humano. The last 200 tokens introduce the fundamental law of the Golden Rose Cross Order, which comprises nine units and an infinite. The key to the nine absolute ternary symbols previously noted is the O or the three symbols of the triple scale of the astronomical worlds.
content: Non settario, perché' il convegno dei Numi (Olimpo) non può' essere una setta; non umano e non divino, ma scientifico nel valore più' puro della parola, perché' scienza e' verità' acquistata e posseduta alla sua fonte vera, cioè' nel legame che unisce i due mondi, l'umano ed il divino, legame che pel profano non ha nome e che gli antichi sacerdoti chiamavano logos (λογος) ed i moderni Verbum. LA LEGGE FONDAMENTALE DEL GR ●●● OR ●●● EG ●●● Tradotta in lingua volgare dai geroglifici della tavola di bronzo comprende Nove Unita' e un Infinito. last_phrase: In summary, the Law of the Great Cosmic Brotherhood is a set of nine fundamental principles that promote the development of human virtues and the perpetuation of the sacred Pontifical Egyptian Science. The key to understanding these principles lies in the O or the three complete symbols of the triple scale of astronomical worlds: the Flame, the Oriflamme, and the Sphinx. Those who observe this law will gain knowledge and power, while those who neglect it will be lost in the ocean of ignorance. For the masters who initiate deserving neophytes, it is recommended to provide them with clarifications regarding their lodge or center.
